scripts.install-current: cordova plugin add com.virtuoworks.cordova-plugin-canvascamera && cordova platform remove android && cordova platform add android
scripts.reinstall-current: cordova plugin remove com.virtuoworks.cordova-plugin-canvascamera && npm run install-current
scripts.install-latest: cordova plugin add git+https://github.com/VirtuoWorks/CanvasCameraPlugin.git && cordova platform remove android && cordova platform add android
scripts.reinstall-latest: cordova plugin remove com.virtuoworks.cordova-plugin-canvascamera && npm run install-latest
